ci_support_linux_64_abiabi3python_min3.1:
abi:
- abi3
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
numpy:
- '2'
python_min:
- '3.11'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - python_min
  - abi

about.summary: Nitime: timeseries analysis for neuroscience data

Nitime: timeseries analysis for neuroscience data
Nitime: timeseries analysis for neuroscience data

name: nitime

about.summary: Nitime: timeseries analysis for neuroscience data
Nitime: timeseries analysis for neuroscience data

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: nitime
  version: "0.12.1"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 12cbf488b0655dc05aa18a0ca5982de970302604e461fc92e87ebd9b7539b6ff

build:
  number: 0
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  python:
    version_independent: ${{ match(abi, '==abi3') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - cython
        - numpy
    - setuptools_scm
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
  host:
    - if: match(abi, '==abi3')
      then: python-abi3
    - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    - cython
    - numpy
    - setuptools_scm
    - setuptools
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - matplotlib-base
    - networkx
    - nibabel
    - scipy

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - nitime
        - nitime.algorithms
        - nitime._utils
  - requirements:
      run:
        - pip
        - if: match(abi, '==abi3')
          then: abi3audit
    script:
      - pip check
      - if: "not win and match(abi, '==abi3')"
        then: abi3audit site-packages/nitime/_utils.abi3.so -s -v --assume-minimum-abi3 ${{ python_min }}
      - if: win and match(abi, '==abi3')
        then: abi3audit site-packages/nitime/_utils.pyd -s -v --assume-minimum-abi3 ${{ python_min }}
  # Pytest with build version
  - requirements:
      run:
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - pytest
    script:
      - pytest --pyargs nitime
  # For ABI3, pytest with latest version
  - if: match(abi, '==abi3')
    then:
      requirements:
        run:
          - python
          - pytest
      script:
        - pytest --pyargs nitime

about:
  summary: "Nitime: timeseries analysis for neuroscience data"
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: http://nipy.org/nitime

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - arokem
    - ocefpaf
    - effigies

about.summary: Nitime: timeseries analysis for neuroscience data
